mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exit_search_lot(idx, lot_no, lot_size, code, codeName, pass_or_fail , constructor, creationDate,note) VALUES (SEARCH_LOT_SEQ.nextval,#{lot_no},#{lot_size},#{code},#{codeName},#{pass_or_fail}, #{constructor},#{creationDate},#{note})
mapper.select: SELECT rownum "rn", idx, lot_no, lot_size, code, codeName, pass_or_fail , constructor, creationDate,note FROM (SELECT idx, lot_no, lot_size, code, codeName, pass_or_fail , constructor, creationDate,note FROM exit_search_lot ORDER BY idx DESC)
SELECT DISTINCT(code) FROM exit_infoitem WHERE code LIKE '%'||#{code}||'%'
SELECT DISTINCT(code) FROM exit_product WHERE code LIKE '%'||#{code}||'%'
